sentences.en: A carper will cavil at anything.
sentences.cn: 爱挑剔的人对什么都挑剔.

sentences.en: Cavil will enter in at any hole, and if it finds none if will make one.
sentences.cn: 苛责简直无孔不入,没孔也能挖个洞;欲加之罪,何患无辞.

sentences.en: Even he could find nothing to cavil about.
sentences.cn: 连他都挑不出什么毛病来.

sentences.en: I don't think this is the time to cavil at the wording of the report.
sentences.cn: 我觉得现在还不是对报告的措辞较真的时候。

sentences.en: Let us not cavil too much.
These cavils aside, most of the essays are very good indeed.
sentences.cn: 撇开这些吹毛求疵的意见，大多数论文确实非常好。

words.tran_cn: 吹毛求疵；苛责；无端的指责

trans.tran_cn: 吹毛求疵；苛责；无端的指责

trans.tran_en: to make unnecessary complaints about someone or something
